items.title: Painted Calm Collection — 6 Serene Blue-Inspired Wallpapers for All Devices
items.excerpt: A soothing set of elegant blue-toned wallpapers inspired by still water, coastal light and painterly Mediterranean atmospheres.

items.title: Blooming Elegance Collection — 7 Elegant Textured Wallpapers for All Devices
items.excerpt: A luxurious collection of floral textured wallpapers inspired by soft blossoms, artistic brush depth and timeless European aesthetics.

items.title: Winter Loop Collection — Seasonal Pricing
items.excerpt: A quiet winter moment: some of Aya’s loops are now available at a gentle seasonal price — a little gift of softness for the cold days.

items.title: Aya Muse — New NFT Collection on Zora
items.excerpt: Aya’s visual universe expands into the world of NFTs — delicate, ethereal, and timeless artworks are now available on Zora.
